"Honor, Duty, Loyalty"
"Honor, Deber, Lealtad" |colors= |march= |mascot= |battles= Anti-coup d' etat Operations, Anti-dissidence, and Community Development Operations |notable_commanders= BGen Manuel S Gonzales AFP |anniversaries=July 12 |decorations= |battle_honours= |identification_symbol_label=Unit Patch |identification_symbol=JTF-NCR Emblem derived from the NCRCOM Unit Seal }} The '''AFP Joint Task Force - National Capital Region''',http://jointtaskforce-ncr.com/ Official Page of the AFP JTF-NCR. known officially as the '''JTF-NCR''' or '''Task Force NCR''', is one the [[Armed Forces of the Philippines]]' Joint Task Forces assigned to combating Terrorism-Insurgency and act as support units to the [[National Capital Region Police Office|Philippine National Police-National Capital Region]] in maintaining peace and order within [[Metro Manila]]. ==History== [[File:Kia KM-450 Truck.jpg|right|thumb|A Kia KM-450 Truck assigned to the defunct NCR Command during one of its MEDCAP Missions in Bgy Sto. Domingo, Quezon City.]] [[National Capital Regional Command (Philippines)|AFP NCR Command]] was formally deactivated on 12 July 2012 following the retirement of its Commanding General, Lieutenant General Tristan M Kison AFP.http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/photo/21767/afp-to-deactivate-ncr-command News on the deactivation of the AFP NCR Command. Joint Task Force National Capital Region was formally activated that same day to assume the roles handed over by the former command, including providing assistance to the [[Presidential Security Group]] in securing the seat of power in [[Malacañang Palace|Malacañan]].http://philippinestoday.blogspot.com.au/2012/07/afps-new-military-force-in-metro-manila.html News on the activation of AFP JTF-NCR.http://www.philstar.com/metro/2012/07/12/826806/new-afp-task-force-launched ==Organization== The following are the units operating under or attached with the AFP JTF-NCR:{{cite web|url=http://dwdd.com.ph/2014/05/jtfncr-joins-in-making-our-school-safer/ |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2014-07-29 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140729005211/http://dwdd.com.ph/2014/05/jtfncr-joins-in-making-our-school-safer/ |archivedate=2014-07-29 |df= }} ;Base Units * Headquarters & Headquarters Service Support Company * GHQ K-9 Unit * GHQ EOD Company ;Line Units * Joint Special Operations Group (NCR Component) * Joint Task Force NCR - Disaster Rescue & Relief Management Unit * [[Presidential Security Group]] * 7th Civil Relations Group ;AFP Technical Services * [[1st Technical and Administrative Services Brigade (Reserve)]] * [[1st Civil Military Affairs Group (Reserve)]] ;[[Philippine Army]] * Joint Task Group NCR Land (Philippine Army Component) * [[National Capital Region Regional Community Defense Group]] * [[15th Infantry Division (Philippines)|15th Infantry Division (Ready Reserve)]] ;[[Philippine Air Force]] * Joint Task Group NCR Air (Philippine Air Force Component) * 1st Air Reserve Center * [[1st Air Force Wing (Ready Reserve)]] ;[[Philippine Navy]] * Joint Task Group NCR Water (Philippine Navy & Marine Corps Component) * [[Naval Forces Reserve National Capital Region|Naval Forces Reserve - NCR]] * [[202nd Naval Squadron (Reserve)]] * [[4th Naval Construction Battalion (Reserve)]] * [[7th Marine Brigade (Reserve)]] ==Lineage of Commanders== * COL MANUEL S RAMIRO (GSC) PAF - 11 Jul 2012 - 22 Mar 2013 * BGEN MANUEL S GONZALES AFP - 28 Jun 2013 - Present ==See also== * [[National Capital Regional Command (Philippines)]] ==Operations== * Anti-guerrilla operations against the [[New People's Army]] * Anti-terrorist operations against known terror groups operating in their AOR. * Community Development of identified urban poor areas within the National Capital Regionhttp://www.abs-cbnnews.com/storypage.aspx?StoryId=84234 Report on Community Service missions rendered by the AFP NCRC. * Intelligence and Counter-Intelligence Operations against government destabilizers.http://www.ncrpo.org/index.php/news/9-ncr-joint-security-task-force-meet-for-secure-barangay-and-sk-elections-2013 ==References== ===Citations=== {{Reflist|2}} ===Bibliography=== * [http://www.afp.mil.ph Official Site of the AFP.] * [http://jointtaskforce-ncr.com/ Official Site of the AFP JTF-NCR.] [[Category:Regional commands of the Philippines]] [[Category:Military units and formations established in 2012]]
